name: Gumble
description:
Gumble has lost his teeth to the wicked Tooth Fairy after eating too many gumballs! Travel through this brickbreak, spelling adventure to get to the Tooth Fairy and get your teeth back!

On this adventure you will encounter many different areas:

  • Arena: Shoot gumballs at blocks before they reach the ground. Get more gumballs by solving a word puzzle!
  • Shop: Purchase different abilities for your orange and green gumballs!
  • Chest: Unscramble the word to unlock the chest for a coin reward!
  • Boss Arena: Defeat the Tooth Fairy and get your teeth back!
